name: Ricetta: Piatto micioso rinvigorente
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making an Invigorating Kitty Meal.

value.name: Pesce
value.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, pu√≤ diventare un piatto prelibato.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Alga
value.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

value.name: Riso
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Piatto micioso rinvigorente
value.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the World Quest "Neko is a Cat: Shrine Recipe"</color>
